translation.en: Are we having a boy or a girl?
- You sure you want to know? - Yes.
- Is everything gonna be OK? - Your baby boy is healthy.
translation.es: - ¿Está todo bien? - Su niño está sano.

translation.en: - We got months to get ready. - Yeah. I'm not worried about that.
translation.es: - Tenemos meses para prepararnos. - No me preocupa eso.

translation.en: Good. Then you shouldn't worry about tonight either.
translation.es: Bien. Y no te preocupes por la cena.

translation.en: Right. 'Cause asking Tom Sutherland for his daughter's hand
translation.es: Sí, pedirle a Tom Sutherland la mano de su hija

translation.en: - is gonna be a walk in the park. - Would you rather tell him I'm pregnant?
translation.es: - es pan comido. - ¿Y si le dices que estoy embarazada?

translation.en: Yeah. At least we'll have something to talk about this time.
translation.es: Al menos tendremos algo de qué hablar.

translation.en: Nothing to be afraid of. Just don't bring up the boat.
translation.es: No tengas miedo. Solo no menciones el barco.

translation.en: I try not to bring up the boat,
but then I get nervous and I end up bringing up the boat.
translation.es: pero me pongo nervioso y lo hago.

translation.en: - He restored it himself, Will. - Yeah, I am aware of that little detail.
translation.es: - Lo restauró él mismo, Will. - Sí, sé ese pequeño detalle.

translation.en: - You're gonna need it. - I know.
- OK, I'll call you from the airport. Bye. - Yeah.
translation.es: - Te llamo del aeropuerto. Adiós. - Sí.

translation.en: OK, I think it's gonna be easy enough to get things going between us.
translation.es: Creo que será fácil comenzar este proyecto.

translation.en: Hey, there. Mr. and Mrs. Sutherland.
- Hi. Good to see you. - Hi. Good to see you, too.
translation.es: - Hola. Me alegro de verte. - Hola. Yo también.

translation.en: - Good to see you. - Yeah, you, too.
translation.es: - Me alegro de verte. - Yo también.

translation.en: I was just about to fix myself another drink.
translation.es: Me iba a preparar otro trago.

translation.en: Why don't you see if Paula can use a little hand in the kitchen?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no ves si Paula necesita ayuda en la cocina?

translation.en: - Anything I can do to help? - Oh, no. You're our guest.
- Why don't you have a seat? - Thank you.
How we looking at time, hon?
Not too long. Enjoy your scotch.
I think it was five, actually.
Sam has the same photo in our loft.
You came with us. How could I forget that?
Took me almost as long to make that one as it did the original.
translation.es: Me tomó casi tanto tiempo como el original.

translation.en: Why don't you put her back down, Will? Let's just stay on the safe side. Alright?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no la dejas, Will? Para evitar problemas, ¿sí?

translation.en: Sam mentioned that the two of you are thinking about
- finding a house. - We're talking about it, yeah.
translation.es: - en buscar una casa. - Lo hablamos, sí.

translation.en: You know, at some point in the future it'd be nice to have some more room.
translation.es: En el futuro sería lindo tener más espacio.

translation.en: - Here you go. - I am of two minds about it, you know?
- What are you of two minds about? - Providing assistance.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué estás indeciso? - No sé si ayudarlos.

translation.en: I need a guarantee that if it doesn't work out,
translation.es: Necesito asegurarme de que si no resulta,

translation.en: you can't make any claims to the money that I put down. Nothing personal, Will.
translation.es: no podrás quedarte con mi dinero. No es nada personal, Will.

translation.en: Sorry, I'm a little confused. Did Sam ask you for help?
No, don't worry about any of that, Will. We've helped her brother, Steven, too.
translation.es: No, no te preocupes. También ayudamos a su hermano, Steven.

translation.en: You know that I'm making good money on this job, right?
translation.es: ¿Sabes que gano bien con este trabajo?

translation.en: If memory serves, you were unemployed before you moved to Seattle. Sam had to
translation.es: Recuerdo que no tenías empleo antes de irte a Seattle.

translation.en: - support both of you for a while there. - No, Sam didn't have to--
translation.es: - Sam tuvo que mantenerlos. - No, Sam no...

translation.en: You know, like I said, work's good.
you know, when it makes sense, when...
when it's the right time, then I'll open my own practice. But...
translation.es: ...sea un buen momento, abriré mi propio estudio.

translation.en: Well, in the meantime, we're fine.
- That's great. - Doesn't sound like much of a plan, Will.
translation.es: - Genial. - No parece un buen plan, Will.

translation.en: Problem with your generation is that nobody wants to work for it.
translation.es: Pero tu generación no trabaja para cumplirlos.

translation.en: I spent 27 years serving our country.
translation.es: Pasé 27 años sirviendo a nuestro país.

translation.en: I saved and I saved until I started working for Northbridge,
translation.es: Ahorré y ahorré hasta que empecé a trabajar en Northbridge,

translation.en: where I started making some real money. But...
translation.es: donde empecé a ganar mucho dinero.

translation.en: You know, I have never asked anyone for any help.
translation.es: Jamás le pedí ayuda a nadie.

translation.en: And you're not asking for anything now.
translation.es: Y no la estás pidiendo ahora.

translation.en: We're just offering to help our daughter.
translation.es: Solo queremos ayudar a nuestra hija.

translation.en: Why did you move to Seattle?
because he thought it would be easier.
translation.es: porque pensó que sería más fácil.

translation.en: Because he thought it would be more secure
translation.es: Porque pensó que sería más seguro

translation.en: if he moved my daughter away from me.
translation.es: mudar a mi hija lejos de mí.

translation.en: - Moving was Sam's idea. - Come on. It's...
translation.es: - La mudanza fue idea de Sam. - Vamos. Eso...

translation.en: You know what, I doubt that. Sam would have told me that.
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué? Lo dudo. Sam me habría dicho.

translation.en: You think she would have told you that she wanted to move away
translation.es: ¿Crees que te habría dicho que quería mudarse lejos

translation.en: to start her life on her own terms with me,
translation.es: para empezar una vida conmigo, a su manera,

translation.en: without her father breathing down her fucking neck all the time?
translation.es: sin que su papá vigile cada puto movimiento?

translation.en: Say what you've gotta say, spit it out. Let us know how you really feel, Will.
translation.es: Di lo que quieras, lárgalo. Dinos lo que sientes, Will.

translation.en: Get it off your chest, but just don't swear in front of my wife.
translation.es: Desahógate, pero no maldigas frente a mi esposa.

translation.en: Whose table do you think you're sitting at?
Sweetheart, it's getting late. Let me walk you out.
translation.es: Cariño, se hace tarde. Déjame acompañarte afuera.

translation.en: Am I your wake- up call?
I was just lying down after the gym.
Yeah, I don't think so. You look like shit.
translation.es: Sí, no lo creo. Te ves como la mierda.

translation.en: Fuck, fuck, fuck, fuck, fuck, fuck, fuck.
Wait, wait. What did she say?
What do you think she said?
Yeah, OK. I'm sorry, alright? I'm sorry, but, Sam, look,
translation.es: Sí, bueno. Lo siento, ¿bien? Lo siento, pero, Sam, mira,

translation.en: he was into me from the second I got in, OK? I guarantee you
translation.es: me molestó desde que llegué. Te lo garantizo:

translation.en: if I'd asked for his blessing last night, he would have said no. So I didn't.
translation.es: si hubiera preguntado, se habría negado. Así que no pregunté.

translation.en: - My mother asked you to leave. - No, no, she didn't.
translation.es: - Mi mamá te pidió que te fueras. - No.

translation.en: It wasn't quite like that. She didn't ask me to leave.
translation.es: No fue tan así. No me pidió que me fuera.

translation.en: I'm really, really fucking late, OK? I gotta go.
translation.es: Se me hizo muy, pero muy tarde, ¿bien? Me tengo que ir.

translation.en: OK, fine. Just call me when you get to the airport.
translation.es: Bien. Llámame cuando llegues al aeropuerto.

translation.en: - Sam, what the hell is that? - I'm scared.
Come on, Sam. Hi, it's me. I'm at the airport. Give me a call.
translation.es: Vamos, Sam. Hola, soy yo. Estoy en el aeropuerto. Llámame.

translation.en: Flight 23 to Seattle is delayed until further notice.
translation.es: El vuelo 23 a Seattle se encuentra demorado hasta próximo aviso.

translation.en: We have some breaking news for you right now.
translation.es: Tenemos una noticia de último momento.

translation.en: We have unconfirmed reports this morning
translation.es: Esta mañana hubo un supuesto sismo

translation.en: of a large seismic event off the southern California coast.
translation.es: de gran magnitud en la costa del sur de California.

translation.en: We currently don't have contact with our Los Angeles bureau.
translation.es: Perdimos contacto con la oficina de Los Ángeles.

translation.en: We're now getting news of power outages
translation.es: Llegan noticias de cortes de luz

translation.en: across the western part of the United States,
translation.es: en el oeste de los Estados Unidos

translation.en: and reports of telecommunication outages as well.
translation.es: y de cortes en las telecomunicaciones.

translation.en: I want to stress this is all preliminary.
translation.es: Quiero remarcar que esto no está confirmado.

translation.en: We are reporting this just as we are learning it.
translation.es: Informamos a medida que llegan datos.

translation.en: We do not yet have any information on damages or casualties.
translation.es: Aún no tenemos información sobre posibles daños o víctimas.

translation.en: Two hundred bucks. Back to the city.
Hey, it's me again. Call me as soon as you get this, alright?
translation.es: Hola, soy yo de nuevo. Llámame apenas escuches esto, ¿sí?

translation.en: I guess that answers that question.
We thought that there was a chance that you flew back.
translation.es: Creíamos que tal vez ya habías vuelto.

translation.en: They shut down O'Hare. I didn't know where else to go.
translation.es: Cerraron el aeropuerto. No sabía dónde ir.

translation.en: Well, have you talked to Sam? I haven't been able to reach her.
Yeah. I was on the phone to her when it happened.
translation.es: Sí. Estaba hablando con ella cuando sucedió.

translation.en: I heard something, so did she.
- What did you hear? - I don't know. It was like a...
translation.es: - ¿Qué oyeron? - No sé. Fue como un...

translation.en: Like a loud rumble or something. I didn't know what it was. And then...
translation.es: Como un rugido fuerte, algo así. No sabía qué era. Luego...

translation.en: - What's the last thing she said? - She said something's wrong.
translation.es: - ¿Qué fue lo último que dijo? - Que pasó algo.

translation.en: Alright, I'm gonna go pack up the rest of my things. Yours are on the table.
translation.es: Voy a terminar de empacar. Lo tuyo está en la mesa.

translation.en: - I should head back to the airport. - I thought you said they shut it down.
translation.es: - Debería ir al aeropuerto. - Dijiste que lo cerraron.

translation.en: Yeah, but once the power comes back on, there'll be flights, right?
translation.es: Sí, pero cuando vuelva la luz, habrá vuelos, ¿no?

translation.en: Let's look at what we know, Will.
There was an event, a couple of hours ago, out west.
translation.es: Hubo un sismo hace unas horas en el oeste.

translation.en: The power shut off here, two thousand miles away.
translation.es: Se cortó la luz aquí, a tres mil kilómetros.

translation.en: We have no idea what's happening, yet we've got F- 22s doing flybys.
translation.es: No tenemos idea de qué está pasando, pero hay cazas volando.

translation.en: This moment is not about waiting for the power to come back on.
translation.es: No hay que esperar a que vuelva la electricidad.

translation.en: The only thing that we can control is what we decide to do.
translation.es: Lo único que podemos controlar son nuestras decisiones.

translation.en: So, what? What are you saying? What are you gonna do?
What, you're gonna drive to Seattle?

translation.es: Paula irá a lo de Steven.

translation.en: I only have one question for you.
- Don't stop for anyone. - Got it.
- I love you. Be safe. - You'll be alright.
How can cell service still be out?
Fill her up with gas, I'll go get supplies.
- Hey, man you got cash? - Yeah.
Wanna show me the back seat?
- What are you talking about? - What's going on, Liza?
- This piece of shit just called me a slut. - What? Whoa, no, no.
translation.es: - Esta mierda me dijo puta. - ¿Qué? No, no.

translation.en: Hey, I didn't call you a slut.
I think this is gonna fucking cost you, man.
- OK, OK. - Hey! Don't do that.
- That's my car. - Shut the fuck up, old man!
- Come on, I know you got some cash. - All right.
translation.es: - Vamos, sé que tienes dinero. - Bien.

translation.en: - Jesus Christ, Tom. - Get back in the car, Will.
translation.es: - Dios, Tom. - Vuelve al auto, Will.

translation.en: Start running and don't look back!
Is there something you want to say?
- Told you what? - Told me that you had a gun.
translation.es: - ¿No te dije qué? - Que tenías un arma.

translation.en: And what would you have said, Will?
I'm assuming that you've never fired a firearm before.
No, I haven't used a firearm, but it's not exactly a priority in my law firm, is it?
translation.es: No, nunca, pero no es una prioridad en un estudio jurídico, ¿no?

translation.en: You know what, Will, what if they had taken this car?
translation.es: ¿Y qué pasaba si se llevaban el auto?

translation.en: Game over. It would be game over!
translation.es: Fin del juego. ¡Hubiera sido el fin!
La interestatal 90 sentido oeste está cerrada.

translation.en: Well, something must be going on if they're not letting us through.
translation.es: Algo debe estar pasando, si no nos dejan seguir.

translation.en: - Is there another way? - No. We need this road.
Sir, the road's closed ahead. Follow the other cars. Thank you.
translation.es: La ruta está cerrada. Siga a los autos. Gracias.

translation.en: I'm sorry, Sergeant. But we got a lot of miles in front of us, and you're shutting down the biggest highway in the country.
translation.es: Perdón, sargento. Pero debemos viajar. Cerraron la autopista más larga del país.

translation.en: Public safety issue, sir. On account of the power outage.
translation.es: Es por seguridad, por el corte de luz.

translation.en: No help for you out there if you have a flat or an accident.
translation.es: No podrán ayudarlos si les pasa algo.

translation.en: - What are you doing? - Can I just have a word, Sergeant?
I understand you got a job to do.
And I know you got orders. I've been there.
translation.es: Sé que tiene órdenes. Estuve en su lugar.

translation.en: I spent the better part of my adult life in the Marine Corps.
translation.es: Estuve muchos años en el Cuerpo de Marines.

translation.en: We'd be on our own, I understand.
But my daughter's a long ways in that direction.
translation.es: Pero mi hija está muy lejos.

translation.en: I'm asking, can you help me?
Let the Caddy through! Local traffic, lives past the next exit.
translation.es: ¡Dejen pasar al Cadillac! Tráfico local, vive por aquí.

translation.en: - Thank you, Sergeant. - Good luck, sir.
Apparently, we're not the only ones heading west.
The F- 22s, the road block. What is this?
translation.es: Los cazas, la ruta cerrada. ¿Qué es esto?

translation.en: Jesus Christ. I didn't even see him coming.
He probably can't run our plates.
I'm gonna check it out, OK?
- Is there a problem, Officer? - Get back in the car!
Will! Get back in the car!
Tell your friend to get out of the fucking car!
- OK. Fuck. - Tell him to get out of the fucking car!
translation.es: - Bueno. Mierda. - ¡Dile que salga del puto auto!

translation.en: Will, let's go! Go, go, go!
Fuck. Get the ammo for the SIG in the trunk!
translation.es: Saca del baúl las municiones para la SIG.

translation.en: - What? It wasn't loaded before? - I didn't need it to be.
Will, just get the ammo out of the go bag.
translation.es: Will, están en la bolsa de emergencia.

translation.en: You see the black bag? Little black bag?
- Yeah, I got it. He's coming! - Take it out.
Put the mag into the weapon.
- How do I do it? - Put the mag in the gun.
translation.es: - ¿Cómo hago? - Pon el cargador en el arma.

translation.en: Hit the button on the side. Shoot. You gotta do it. Shoot.
translation.es: Aprieta el botón del costado. Dispara. Hazlo.

translation.en: - Fuck, it's not working! What do I do? - Pull it back! Put it in the chamber!
Put the bullet in the chamber. Pull the top back.
translation.es: La bala en la recámara. Tira hacia atrás.

translation.en: - See if you have a cartridge inside. - Fuck!
Get out of the car, faggot. Now.
translation.es: Sal del auto, hijo de puta. Ahora.

translation.en: I think I broke my ribs.
We're gonna need to find a garage.
We were... We've been in an accident.
- You guys even know where you are? - No.
- We were hoping for your help. - You guys got money?
- I ain't doing shit for free. - Nor should you.
translation.es: - No trabajo gratis. - Y no deberías.

translation.en: If you need new parts, I can't help you.
translation.es: Si necesitan repuestos, no puedo ayudarlos.

translation.en: - Understood. - Restroom's all the way in the back.
Hey! I told you not to fuck with them!
translation.es: ¡Te dije que no jodas con ellos!

translation.en: Who the fuck do you think you are?
So, all cell service goes out.
Virtually all communications, except local ham radio like us or short wave.
translation.es: Todas las comunicaciones, menos las de radioaficionados o de onda corta.

translation.en: But how does that happen, huh? US Government goes virtually silent?
translation.es: Pero ¿cómo sucede eso? ¿El gobierno no dice nada?

translation.en: Are we talking World War Three? Like a nuke attack that went sideways?
translation.es: ¿Es la Tercera Guerra Mundial? ¿Un ataque nuclear que salió mal?

translation.en: I mean, the damned president's doing a massive cover- up.
translation.es: El maldito presidente está cubriendo todo.

translation.en: Military coup? Martial law? We don't know, we don't know.
If anyone out there who knows anything, get on short wave. Please, do it now.
translation.es: Si alguien sabe, por favor, comuníquese por onda corta.

translation.en: - Is anyone out there? - Two thousand satellites in space,
- all of them down? - Answer me, I--
Government knows, man. They're just keeping it from us.
translation.es: El gobierno sabe. Lo mantiene en secreto.

translation.en: I sealed the radiator. It should hold.
- You can keep driving for a while. - A while?
Radiator isn't gonna break. Might start leaking again, though.
translation.es: El radiador no se va a romper. Quizá vuelva a perder.

translation.en: I can give you some of the sealant, show you how to use it.
translation.es: Puedo darte sellador y mostrarte cómo usarlo.

translation.en: I'll gave you $200 for the labor.
translation.es: Te daré 200 dólares por tu trabajo.

translation.en: And if we get to where we're going, I'll mail you another two.
translation.es: Y si llegamos a destino, te enviaré 200 más.

translation.en: Yeah. How about you give me that other two right now?
translation.es: Bien. ¿Y si me das los otros 200 ahora?

translation.en: Is that your Buick out there?
No, I was gonna head out to California and get the fuck out of this place.
translation.es: No, iba a irme a California para escapar de este puto lugar.

translation.en: But now all she needs is a new transmission, so she ain't for sale.
translation.es: Necesita una nueva transmisión, no está a la venta.

translation.en: Then maybe you should come with us.
- I don't think so. - We're going out west.
translation.es: - No lo creo. - Vamos hacia el oeste.

translation.en: Yeah? Why would I want to go with you?
You can keep the cash and be almost all the way to California.
translation.es: Puedes... ...quedarte el dinero y estarías cerca de California.

translation.en: If you have any problems or a break down, you can fix it.
translation.es: Si se rompe el auto, puedes repararlo.

translation.en: No disrespect, but I ain't about doing no road trip right now
translation.es: No quiero faltarte el respeto, pero no voy a irme de viaje ahora

translation.en: with two shady dudes that appear out of nowhere.
translation.es: con dos tipos turbios que salieron de la nada.

translation.en: Whoa, whoa. We're not shady, come on.
You two roll up in a fucked- up, shot up cop car that you say you found,
translation.es: Llegan en una patrulla hecha mierda y llena de balazos que encontraron por ahí,

translation.en: towing a shot up Caddy, and...
translation.es: remolcando un auto lleno de balazos...

translation.en: You know, you got blood all over your face. So, yeah.
translation.es: Y tienes sangre en la cara. Así que, sí.

translation.en: I hear you loud and clear. Doesn't look good.
translation.es: Te entiendo totalmente. No se ve bien.

translation.en: I could tell you that it wasn't us.
translation.es: Podría decirte que no fue nuestra culpa...

translation.en: we were you just defending ourselves. I could tell you
actually what happened, down to the very last detail, but...
translation.es: qué pasó realmente, hasta el último detalle, pero...

translation.en: if I were you, I'm not sure I would believe that either.
But I can tell you this.
With a clear conscience, I can look you in the eye and I can say...
translation.es: Con la conciencia tranquila, puedo mirarte a los ojos y decir

translation.en: there's a lot to be afraid of out there.
translation.es: que hay muchas cosas que dan miedo.

translation.en: None of us know how much.
We're just driving out west to see if we can find my daughter.
translation.es: Solo estamos yendo al oeste para intentar encontrar a mi hija.

translation.en: I'll do it for two thousand.
As long as we don't snap an axle, I can get us to Seattle.
translation.es: Si no se rompe el eje, llegaremos a Seattle.

translation.en: Oh, and I siphoned the cop's gas.
translation.es: Ah, y tomé la gasolina del policía.

translation.en: - What are you doing? - I want us to be invisible from behind.
translation.es: - ¿Qué haces? - Quiero que seamos invisibles de atrás.

translation.en: - Here you go, Will. Drive the first shift. - OK.
Course Tonto rides in the fucking back.
translation.es: Por supuesto. La india va atrás.
Más le vale que no vuelva.

translation.en: So, you guys got a radio signal?
Is there a frontage road to the 90? Another way west?
translation.es: ¿Hay una ruta lateral? ¿Otro camino al oeste?

translation.en: Take a left here. Can head out on the 14 West for a while.
translation.es: Gira a la izquierda aquí. Podemos ir por la 14 un poco.

translation.en: What kinda music you guys into?
Yeah, I don't think it's that kind of road trip, Ricki.
translation.es: No creo que sea esa clase de viaje, Ricki.

translation.en: - Use their taillights to guide us. - OK.
translation.es: - Usa sus luces como guía. - Bien.

translation.en: Yeah, let him. He's gonna want to drive when he wakes up.
translation.es: Sí, déjalo. Querrá manejar cuando se despierte.

translation.en: So, his daughter... that's your girl?
- They on our side of the road? - Jesus!
- I think it's a telephone number. - Will, let him be.
translation.es: - Creo que es un teléfono. - Will, déjalo.

translation.en: We're hours from a hospital, and this guy, he's not gonna make it.
translation.es: Estamos a horas de un hospital, no sobrevivirá.

translation.en: Let's get back in the car. Let's go, guys. Let's go. Let's go.
translation.es: Volvamos al auto. Vamos, chicos. Vamos.

translation.en: You gotta stop the car for Ricki. Stop the car, Tom. Stop the fucking car!
translation.es: Tienes que parar por Ricki. Detente, Tom. ¡Detén el puto auto!

translation.en: If Will hadn't told me to wait, I would've left you.
translation.es: Si Will no me pedía que pare, te dejaba.

translation.en: See if I fix your car if it breaks down again.
translation.es: ¿Ahora quién reparará tu auto si se rompe?

translation.en: We had a deal. If you're not gonna honor it, you need to speak up now.
translation.es: Hicimos un trato. Si no vas a cumplirlo, dilo ahora.

translation.en: Yeah, he can be pretty hard.
You don't know what hard is, man.
translation.es: No sabes lo que es ser duro.

translation.en: What? You don't think that I got it?
No, of course I do. I just, you know, I thought it was a pretty odd career path.
translation.es: No, por supuesto que sí. Solo que es una carrera bastante extraña.

translation.en: You ever seen clouds like that before?
- Go, go! Get in the car! - Get in!
You see the bridge? Do you see it?
What the fuck is going on?
- Never seen a storm like this. - This is crazy.
translation.es: - Nunca vi una tormenta así. - Qué locura.

translation.en: ...as much information as we can, for as long as we can.
For as long as this generator will let us.
translation.es: Mientras este generador nos lo permita.

translation.en: Still no internet. No cell service. No nothing.
translation.es: Todavía no hay Internet. Ni señal. Ni nada.

translation.en: You're gonna want to stay on the 17.
I have friends in Ashland Heights. I already checked.
translation.es: Tengo amigos en Ashland Heights. Ya me fijé.

translation.en: We can stop there. We can resupply.
We can resupply anywhere. We don't wanna go out of our way.
translation.es: Paremos en otro lado. No nos desviemos.

translation.en: Look, why don't we just stop, OK?
Ricki can check the car and my friends can help us.
translation.es: Así Ricki revisa el auto y mis amigos nos ayudan.

translation.en: - You just drive. I got the plans. - I said they're friends, Tom.
translation.es: - Tú maneja. Yo planeo. - Son mis amigos, Tom.

translation.en: They're not just my friends, they're Sam's friends.
translation.es: Y también son amigos de Sam.

translation.en: No services here. No gas, no nothing.
We've been on the road for a long time. A good friend of mine lives in the town.
translation.es: Hace mucho que estamos viajando. Un amigo mío vive aquí.

translation.en: Every car that stops here says they got friends in this little town.
translation.es: Todos los que paran dicen que tienen amigos aquí.

translation.en: His name's Adam Dumont. He was born and raised here.
translation.es: Se llama Adam Dumont. Nació y se crió aquí.

translation.en: I was a groomsman at his wedding.
My girlfriend and I have been here, like, half a dozen times.
translation.es: Mi novia y yo vinimos varias veces.

translation.en: she owns a pottery store in town. I can't remember what the name of it is.
translation.es: es dueña de una tienda de cerámica. No recuerdo cuál era el nombre.

translation.en: We just wanna get off the road for a couple of hours and then we'll be gone.
translation.es: Solo queremos parar un par de horas y luego nos vamos.

translation.en: Find an escort for these boys over to the Dumonts'.
translation.es: Que los escolten a lo de los Dumont.

translation.en: And make sure, they get turned away, they come straight back here.
translation.es: Y asegúrense de que si no les permiten entrar, regresen aquí.

translation.en: Is it North Korea? Is it the Chinese?
Who else could do this? Who else would do this?
translation.es: ¿Quién más podría hacer esto? ¿Quién más haría esto?

translation.en: Damn it. Maybe they're in it together.
translation.es: Mierda. Tal vez se aliaron para hacerlo.

translation.en: We do know they hate us.
How did you even get here?
This is Tom, Sam's dad. And Ricki in the back.
translation.es: Él es Tom, el papá de Sam. Y Ricki está atrás.

translation.en: Hey. We should all go inside.
I'm gonna take a couple of minutes to check out the car and get organized.
translation.es: Voy a tomarme unos minutos para revisar el auto y organizarme.

translation.en: - Where's... Where's Sam? - I'll explain inside.
The Bible says, The earth knew not
translation.es: La Biblia dice: Y no se daban cuenta,

translation.en: until the flood came and took them...
translation.es: hasta que vino el diluvio y se los llevó a todos...

translation.en: When was last time you heard from Adam?
translation.es: ¿Cuándo hablaste con Adam por última vez?

translation.en: I guess the night before it all, so...
translation.es: Creo que la noche anterior a esto...

translation.en: He's... He's on a business trip to San Francisco.
translation.es: Está en San Francisco en un viaje de negocios.

translation.en: Well, if anyone's gonna be OK, it's Adam.
translation.es: Estoy seguro de que está bien.

translation.en: I mean, none of this makes any sense. It's just that...
translation.es: Nada de esto tiene sentido. Es que...

translation.en: These fucking storms and then this heat. And we've been having earthquakes.
translation.es: Estas tormentas de mierda, y ahora este calor. Y hubo sismos.

translation.en: It's just... I mean, it's so crazy that you're here and...
translation.es: Es que... Es tan loco que estés aquí y...

translation.en: - It's gonna be OK, Meg. - Yeah.
translation.es: - Todo va a estar bien, Meg. - Sí.

translation.en: it can't stay like this forever.
Really? Do you really think that?
- Sorry. I haven't been sleeping and it... - No, it's fine, It's OK.
translation.es: - Lo siento. No dormí y... - Está bien, no hay problema.

translation.en: Do you want to take a shower? We still have plenty of water.
- Need help? - Nah, I just got one more left.
How do we not know anything?
Doesn't that tell you something, Will? If they were all right, we would know.
translation.es: ¿Eso no te dice algo, Will? Si estuvieran bien, lo sabríamos.

translation.en: I just... None of this is real. It can't be real.
translation.es: Es que... Nada de esto es real. No puede ser real.

translation.en: No one's telling me anything and...
and no one even knows that I'm here.
translation.es: ...nadie ni siquiera sabe que estoy aquí.

translation.en: Adam knows you're here. And he's coming back for you. I know that.
translation.es: Adam sabe que estás aquí. Y volverá por ti. Lo sabes.

translation.en: Because I can feel it, Will.
I can feel that he's gone.
- I can feel it in my bones. I know it. - No, no, no. Just...
translation.es: - Lo siento. Lo sé. - No. Solo...

translation.en: And I know that Sam is gone, Will. She's gone!
translation.es: Y sé que Sam se ha ido, Will. ¡Se ha ido!

translation.en: We are gonna be fine. OK?
Adam is coming back for you.
We need to load the supplies in the car.
translation.es: Debemos cargar todo en el auto.

translation.en: - Was it shot down? - I don't know.
Let's see if there's anything useful down there.
translation.es: Veamos si hay algo útil allí.

translation.en: Holy shit! Holy fuck! It's hot in there!
I thought it was gonna be cold.
translation.es: Creí que iba a estar fría.

translation.en: - It's not funny. - It kinda is a little bit funny.
translation.es: - No es gracioso. - Un poquito gracioso.

translation.en: OK. We're gonna need to split up.

translation.es: Sí. De la base del ejército.

translation.en: I just think it's funny that the Army
named its helicopters after tribes they tried to wipe out.
translation.es: tengan nombres de tribus que quisieron exterminar.

translation.en: Look, Ricki. You're on gas detail.
translation.es: Ricki. Tú te encargas de la gasolina.

translation.en: Want you to grab the cans, check out the cars,
look at the generators, whatever you find. We're gonna go check out the diner.
translation.es: mira los generadores, todo. Revisaremos el comedor.

translation.en: So, what are we looking for?
Be sure to get what we need.
- I said get gas! - I already found some.
Cars had their tires slashed, but still had gas in the back.
translation.es: Los autos tenían las gomas pinchadas, pero tenían gasolina.

translation.en: - What's going on? - He broke some ribs.
Wake up. Both of you, wake up.
Check your phone. Ricki, check your phone. Tom, check your phone now.
translation.es: Mira tu teléfono. Ricki, míralo. Tom, mira tu teléfono ya.

translation.en: I just heard. We got cell reception, I think.
I love you. Can you hear me?
The message is two days old.
- Where the hell are they coming from? - I don't know.
- Jesus. We should turn around. - This road's the only way over the pass.
translation.es: - Dios. Deberíamos volver. - Esta ruta es el único camino.

translation.en: - This is a mistake. Why are we stopping? - I just want to see what's going on.
translation.es: - Esto es un error. ¿Por qué paramos? - Quiero ver qué sucede.

translation.en: - You OK, lady? What happened? - I need help.
OK, why don't you just come to us. It's safer over here.
translation.es: ¿Por qué no se acerca? Es más seguro aquí.

translation.en: You just need to get in the car. It's safer in the car. Come on, come on.
translation.es: Solo tiene que entrar al auto. Es más seguro. Vamos.

translation.en: - I just need help. - Where's your spare? Is it in the car?
translation.es: - Ayúdenme. - ¿Tiene otra rueda en el auto?

translation.en: I don't know. I don't know.
- All right. Come on, Ricki. - I can't.
I can't. I don't know how. I need help.
translation.es: No puedo. No sé cómo. Necesito ayuda.

translation.en: - You happy? You happy now? - Go get it.
- What the fuck is he doing? - It's not personal.
- We all got places to be. - Stay calm.
Stay calm, all right? Stay calm.
- Open it. - It's locked and I don't have the key.
Don't. Don't fucking do it, man.
- Just leave us one canister, please. - Shut your fucking mouth.
translation.es: - Solo déjanos un bidón. - Cierra la puta boca.

translation.en: - Jesus Christ! - Tom, you all right?
Get the gas. Let's get the hell out of here.
translation.es: Toma la gasolina. Vámonos de aquí.

translation.en: Just get the gas. Let's fucking go, man.
translation.es: Solo toma la gasolina. Vamos, amigo.

translation.en: - Leave us one can, man. Please. - Hurry!
Don't leave us here to die.
- Let's fucking go. - You're killing us. Don't take the gas!
translation.es: - Vamos. - Nos matas. ¡No te la lleves!

translation.en: - My ribs. Couldn't lift my gun. - Fuck!
translation.es: - Las costillas. No pude usar el arma. - ¡Mierda!

translation.en: - All of you. - You fucking helped them!
- All right. Come on, get in the car. - Why'd you stop?
- We're supposed to be decent. - Get in the car. We have to go right now!
translation.es: - Se supone que somos decentes. - Entra. ¡Nos vamos!

translation.en: I'm staying with him. I'm not leaving my husband like this. Not with you people!
translation.es: Me quedo con él. No voy a dejar a mi esposo así. ¡No con ustedes!

translation.en: We gotta go. If we don't catch them, we're dead. Come on, go.
translation.es: Si no los atrapamos, moriremos. Vamos.

translation.en: - Come on, get in the car! - Let's go, Will. Can't lose them.
Come on! Come on, damn it.
- You know how to use this? - Yeah.
You go it. Shoot the tire, Ricki!
- I can't open it! - Let go of me!
- Come on, Ricki. Come on. Damn it! - I can't! He's holding it.
translation.es: - Vamos, Ricki. - ¡No puedo! La tiene él.

translation.en: We're running out of time. Go, go. Come on!
- I can't pull over here, Ricki. - I said pull over.
translation.es: - No puedo, Ricki. - Dije que pares.

translation.en: - I said pull over! - OK, OK.
They robbed us, Ricki. They were gonna kill us.
You saved us. That's the truth.
translation.es: Nos salvaste. Esa es la verdad.

translation.en: - You did a good thing. - Yeah? For what?
So I can do this all over again?
It's another fucking thousand miles to Seattle.
- It's OK. It's OK. - I'm not gonna shoot you!
I'd rather go back to the fucking rez than spend another minute here with you.
translation.es: Prefiero volver a la reserva que seguir con ustedes.

translation.en: We're in the middle of fucking nowhere.
translation.es: Estamos en medio de la nada.

translation.en: You think that I wouldn't make it?
Who do you think's been taking care of me since the day that I was born?
translation.es: ¿Quién crees que me cuida desde que nací?

translation.en: We'll survive this longer than you.
translation.es: Vamos a sobrevivir más que ustedes.

translation.en: - Fuck both you guys. - Ricki, OK, let's just take a...
translation.es: - Váyanse a la mierda. - Ricki, vamos...

translation.en: We're gonna take a second, all right? And we're gonna rest here.
Let's just give her a minute.
Should never have asked her to come with us.
- What's going on, Tom? - I can't breathe.
- All right. Let's get some help right now. - No time. My lungs are collapsing.
translation.es: - Pidamos ayuda. - No hay tiempo. Mis pulmones colapsan.

translation.en: - Gotta let the pressure out. - OK. How, how would--
translation.es: - Hay que sacar la presión. - Bueno. Cómo...

translation.en: - What you want me to do? - Put it in.
your father left you. That's ugly.
And you were just a kid, right?
I guess. He lives in Idaho now with his new family. I see him...
translation.es: Supongo. Ahora vive en Idaho con su nueva familia.

translation.en: It's a shame that you never got to meet my father.
translation.es: Qué lastima que no conociste a mi padre.

translation.en: Sam must have told you some stories about him.
translation.es: Sam debió haberte hablado de él.

translation.en: He had this... had this look,
when he thought you crossed the line.
translation.es: cuando te pasabas de la raya.

translation.en: It wasn't in disappointment, you know?
'cause he was disgusted at the fact that he brought you into the world.
translation.es: ...que le daba asco saber que te había traído al mundo.

translation.en: I mean, in his heart, he was a good man.
translation.es: En el fondo, era un buen hombre.

translation.en: I don't know if I'm a good father.
translation.es: No sé si soy un buen padre.

translation.en: You know I love your daughter.
translation.es: Sabes que amo a tu hija.

translation.en: If I didn't think that, I would have killed you a long time ago.
translation.es: Si no pensara eso, te habría matado hace mucho.

translation.en: You'll be on your own soon.
I need to ask your word on something.
Yeah, of course, anything. Whatever you want.
translation.es: Sí, por supuesto. Lo que quieras.

translation.en: that you'll always keep her safe.
of course I will. I promise you.
there's something I need to tell you.
No, no. You don't know this, Tom. No, you don't know.
translation.es: No, no. No sabes esto, Tom. No, no lo sabes.

translation.en: What do you mean you know? How'd you know?
Paula, she called her after our dinner,
translation.es: Paula la llamó, después de la cena

translation.en: Said that you're having a baby boy!
- So, all this time you... - Yeah.
translation.es: - Así que todo este tiempo... - Sí.

translation.en: I got to tell you something else, too.
I got to tell you about the boat.
Seriously? You know, why don't you quit while you're ahead on this.
translation.es: ¿En serio? ¿Por qué no lo dejas así?

translation.en: You know all that shit you gave me,
The really funny thing is you...
you think it was me that was driving that boat when it crashed into the rock.
translation.es: ... tú crees que yo manejaba el barco cuando se estrelló.

translation.en: - Get out! It was Sam? - Yeah. Hell, yeah.
drunk as anything. I mean, we both were and...
translation.es: Muy borracha. Los dos estábamos borrachos y...

translation.en: you know, when we came down in the morning,
and we see the boat, it had sunk to the bottom of the fucking lake, I mean...
translation.es: y vimos el barco, se había hundido al fondo del lago...

translation.en: I thought it was the right thing to do, you know
You're gonna be a good father.
Maybe we can get some help here.
No, no, no, no, no, no, no.
My friend is sick. He needs a doctor.
All right, we're coming. Just don't shoot.
- Wait, we can't go over there. - Yeah, no shit, Tom.
translation.es: - Espera, no podemos ir ahí. - No me digas, Tom.

translation.en: When I say three, I want you to swerve to your left.
translation.es: Cuando cuente hasta tres, da un volantazo a la izquierda.

translation.en: I'm going west, trying to get to Seattle.
translation.es: Al oeste, intento llegar a Seattle.

translation.en: We've been staying off the interstate. It's not safe.
translation.es: Estamos evitando la interestatal. No es segura.

translation.en: All right, we'll take you as far as we can.
I got family in the car.
Do you have any idea what happened?
Started in Los Angeles. Or at least...
translation.es: Empezó en Los Ángeles. O por lo menos...

translation.en: They're saying go to Canada. Something about the air.
translation.es: Dicen que hay que ir a Canadá. Algo sobre el aire.

translation.en: - It's been three days now? - No. Today's day five.
translation.es: - ¿Ya van tres días? - No. Es el quinto.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. It's my father's place.
translation.es: Sí. Es la casa de mi papá.

translation.en: There's bedrooms upstairs if you want to rest.
translation.es: Pueden ir arriba, si quieren descansar.

translation.en: And hopefully there's some food in the kitchen, take a look.
translation.es: Y tal vez haya comida en la cocina, fíjense.

translation.en: Look, I just want to say
There's about three weeks of food here.
translation.es: Hay comida como para tres semanas aquí.

translation.en: Generator last will you five days, maybe more if you're conservative.
translation.es: El generador durará cinco días, quizá más si tienen cuidado.

translation.en: There's one car in the garage, but I had to siphon off most of the gas.
translation.es: Hay un auto en el garaje, tuve que sacarle gasolina.

translation.en: But if you look around, you're gonna find enough to get north.
translation.es: Pero encontrarás suficiente para ir al norte.

translation.en: But I need to leave right now.
And I need a four- wheel drive.
Which means I need to take your Jeep.
That's the deal that I'm offering.
He's our neighbor, Will. Put your guns down!
translation.es: Es nuestro vecino, Will. ¡Bajen las armas!

translation.en: - I can't believe it. - The baby's OK.
translation.es: - No lo creo. - El bebé está bien.

translation.en: - Come here. Please, come here. - I'm here.
translation.es: - Abrázame. Por favor, abrázame. - Aquí estoy.

translation.en: You know, I wouldn't have made it without him.
translation.es: No lo habría logrado sin él.

translation.en: And I did everything I could. I did everything.
translation.es: Hice todo lo posible. Hice todo.

translation.en: I'm never gonna leave you again.
You know, when I saw Seattle, I didn't think that...
translation.es: Cuando vi Seattle, no pensé que...

translation.en: before the police were just yelling at everybody to evacuate.
translation.es: y la policía comenzó a gritar que había que evacuar.

translation.en: I mean, you could see the Sound
and the water retreat. I've never seen anything like that before.
translation.es: y el agua retirándose. Nunca vi algo así.

translation.en: We were a couple miles inland by the time the waves hit.
translation.es: Estábamos a unos kilómetros cuando llegaron las olas.

translation.en: And just so you know, Will...
I don't think this was an earthquake.
translation.es: ...no creo que haya sido un sismo.

translation.en: I've seen tons of war games simulations,
translation.es: Vi miles de simulaciones de juegos de guerra,

translation.en: to erase rational behavior with what appears to be a singular incident.
translation.es: para eliminar el comportamiento racional con un único suceso.

translation.en: What the fuck you talking about?
- Look, I'm not trying to upset you. - You're not upsetting me.
translation.es: - No quiero preocuparte... - No estoy preocupado.

translation.en: I know the last couple days have been rough on you.
translation.es: Estos días han sido difíciles para ti.

translation.en: I mean, come on, you don't really believe this bullshit, do you?
translation.es: Vamos, no crees toda esta mierda, ¿verdad?

translation.en: I just drove across the fucking country. You can't create things that I've seen.
translation.es: Acabo de cruzar todo el país. No puedes crear las cosas que vi.

translation.en: - Seriously, are you fucking with me? - No, I'm not fucking with you.
Think about it in laymen's terms. A nuclear bomb goes off the coast.
translation.es: Piénsalo en términos sencillos. Explota una bomba nuclear.

translation.en: Then a virus takes down the grid before anyone can figure out what happened.
translation.es: Un virus desactiva la red eléctrica antes de que descubramos qué pasó.

translation.en: - I've seen the intel. - You haven't seen it. There is no intel.
translation.es: - Vi los datos de inteligencia. - No, no hay datos.

translation.en: - That is fucking bullshit. - The bomb plays like an earthquake.
translation.es: - Es una puta mentira. - La bomba parece un sismo.

translation.en: But the power going out, that created the chaos.
translation.es: Y la falta de electricidad creó el caos.

translation.en: Don't you think it's strange that...
the power just went out everywhere?
translation.es: se haya cortado en todos lados?

translation.en: The communications? I mean, just fucking think about it, man.
Unless, I don't know, I don't know. Maybe he believes in coincidences.
translation.es: A menos que, no sé. Tal vez cree en las coincidencias.

translation.en: I'm gonna clean up here. all right?
And we can talk about all this in the morning, all right?
translation.es: Y podemos hablar de esto mañana, ¿sí?

translation.en: When you've had a good rest and you're feeling better, OK?
translation.es: Cuando hayas descansado y te sientas mejor, ¿bien?

translation.en: You know, there was an ash cloud over the ocean.
translation.es: Hay una nube de ceniza sobre el océano.

translation.en: God knows how many other cities.
I don't know what the fuck is going on,
and you do not know what the fuck is going on either.
translation.es: y tú tampoco sabes qué mierda sucede.

translation.en: So, let's not pretend that you do, OK?
translation.es: Así que no pretendas que sí, ¿bien?

translation.en: They happen all the time now.
Well, in the end, it doesn't really matter, I guess.
translation.es: Bueno, a fin de cuentas, no importa.

translation.en: We all have to live, right?
Can I see that SIG of yours?
Be nicer with bullets, though, right?
I know he helped you, but he just...
Tell me you don't believe that bullshit that he's telling you?
translation.es: ¿Dime que no crees esa mierda que dice?

translation.en: are the only thing that matters.
I let the whiskey do the talking.
I guess I just convinced myself that that would put me more in control, but...
translation.es: Supongo que me convencí de que estaría más en control, pero...

translation.en: It doesn't make me crazy, right?
Why were you looking in my car this morning?
I wasn't trying to steal your car, Will, if that's what you're after.
translation.es: No quería robarte el auto, Will, si eso crees.

translation.en: I saw two kids. I thought that maybe they took something from your car.
translation.es: Vi dos niños. Pensé que se habían llevado algo de tu auto.

translation.en: Where are these kids right now?
I've been running a perimeter every morning since we got here.
translation.es: Recorro el perímetro todas las mañanas.

translation.en: Come with me, I'll show you.
Must be a volcano around here.
Unless you want to stay, you should come with us.
translation.es: Si no te quedarás, deberías venir.

translation.en: I don't see any kids out here.
I'm not the boogie man, Will.
We have a bond. That means I get a voice.
translation.es: Tenemos un vínculo. Tengo derecho a opinar.

translation.en: Well, I'm not, am I? I'm here.
You don't have to do this.
- We have to go right now. - What?
- OK. OK. Where's Jeremiah? - He tried to kill me. Come on.
translation.es: - Bueno. ¿Dónde está Jeremiah? - Intentó matarme. Vamos.

translation.en: - What is it? - It's happening again.
We're gonna make it. No matter what happens, we're gonna make it, OK?
translation.es: No importa lo que suceda, sobreviviremos, ¿sí?

translation.en: Look at me, OK? Look at me.
- It's gonna be OK. - I know.
translation.es: - Vamos a estar bien. - Lo sé.

translation.en: - I love you. - I love you.
